turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Perchance to Dream (musical).
turn.1: What was the name of the Perchance to Dream musical?
turn.2: Perchance to Dream (musical) Perchance to Dream is a musical romance with book, lyrics and music by Ivor Novello.
turn.3: What is significant about this musical?
turn.4: It was the only musical for which Novello wrote lyrics.
turn.5: What other aspects of the musical are notable?
turn.6: The title is a quotation from William Shakespeare's play "Hamlet".
turn.8: The plot, like many of Novello's plots, is a romantic adventure tale, telling the parallel stories of the fates of several inhabitants of the same house through differing time periods.
turn.9: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.10: The stories interconnect and have unforeseen repercussions, one upon the other.
turn.12: It opened on the London stage at the Hippodrome Theatre on 21 April 1945.
